text:
="preserve">Erik Meijs (April 20, 1991 in Zoetermeer - November 16, 2017 in Duisburg, Germany) was a Dutch male badminton player.
Meijs became Dutch junior master in badminton men's single in 2010, and Dutch master in badminton men's single in 2016.
He died of the wounds caused by a car accident in 2017, at the age of 26.
